statements: SELECT * FROM Influencers
SELECT id, name FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000
SELECT name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count < 5000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name
SELECT AVG(followers_count) AS avg_followers_count FROM Influencers
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate < 3.0 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM ConsumerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND followers < 5000;
SELECT id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM ConsumerBehavior WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_followers FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM influencer;
SELECT consumer_name, consumer_age, consumer_gender FROM consumer;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencer;
SELECT consumer_name, consumer_location FROM consumer;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM consumer_behavior;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencer
SELECT * FROM consumer WHERE consumer_age > 30 ORDER BY consumer_name DESC
SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_behaviors FROM influencer JOIN consumer_behavior ON influencer.influencer_id = consumer_behavior.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name

SELECT influencer_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM influencer JOIN consumer_behavior ON influencer.influencer_id = consumer_behavior.influencer_id WHERE behavior_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC
SELECT consumer_name, consumer_age, consumer_gender, influencer_category FROM consumer JOIN influencer ON consumer.consumer_id = influencer.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT follower_name, follow_date FROM followers WHERE follow_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text, created_at FROM comments WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_name FROM influencers JOIN followers ON influencers.influencer_id = followers.influencer_id WHERE followers.follow_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT influencer_name, post_content, comments.comment_text FROM influencers JOIN posts ON influencers.influencer_id = posts.influencer_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments.created_at >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY comments.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT Influencers.influencer_name, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Influencers INNER JOIN Interactions ON Influencers.influencer_id = Interactions.influencer_id WHERE Interactions.interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT follower_name, influencer_name FROM Followers INNER JOIN Influencers ON Followers.following_influencer_id = Influencers.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers JOIN Interactions ON Influencers.influencer_id = Interactions.influencer_id WHERE Interactions.interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;

SELECT Brands.brand_name, COUNT(Posts.post_id) AS total_posts FROM Brands JOIN Posts ON Brands.brand_id = Posts.influencer_id GROUP BY Brands.brand_name HAVING total_posts > 10 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes, AVG(engagement_rate) AS avg_engagement FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC;

SELECT follower_name, influencer_name, interaction_timestamp FROM Followers JOIN Interactions ON Followers.follower_id = Interactions.follower_id JOIN Influencers ON Interactions.influencer_id = Influencers.influencer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
